forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
